name: ROOST MX
description:
ROOST MX Welcome to Mirage
v.1.0 Controls:

Steer Left: A
Steer Right: D
Accelerate: W
Brake: S
Shift Up: M
Shift Down: N
Wheelie: K
Re-Spawn: R

Description:

Motocross game based on 250/450cc dirt bike physics.
Currently in a free-ride demo state.

Design a bike and enter Mirage!

------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game can also be played at LitLabProductions/Roost

Bug reports can be submitted here
